title: Key Penang Statistics
text:
Dashboards

Economic indicators











Consumer Price Index


Track Penang’s cost of living with visualizations of inflation trends across food, housing, and more


















External Trade


Gauge Penang’s trade performance at a glance, exploring export and import trends by product and partner nation


















Gross Domestic Product


Chart Penang’s economic trajectory with GDP insights, revealing sector contributions and key trends


















Labour Force


Visualise principal labour force statistics and distribution of the workforce across key demographics, sectors and occupations












No matching items






Sector-specific











Approved Manufacturing Investments


Explore the landscape and composition of manufacturing investment in Penang


















Graduate Employability


Analyze employment rates for Penang’s graduates, field of study trends, and career paths by field with Graduate Tracer Study data


















Healthcare


Uncover trends in healthcare access, utilisation and disease prevalence in Penang


















Penang State Finance


Explore the state’s development and operating balances, revenue streams, and detailed expenditure breakdowns


















Residential Property


Track transaction trends in Penang’s housing market, gauge unsold inventory, monitor new launches, and assess affordability with the price-to-income ratio












No matching items






Social indicators











Gender


Explore Penang’s gender landscape, including education, employment and leadership disparities


















Household Income


Unmask Penang’s economic disparities: explore household income trends and analyze inequality patterns


















Population and Demographics


Explore population and migration trends, ethnic composition, and age distribution of Penang’s people

title: Resources
text:
Links are only provided for reference. We are not responsible for the contents of external links.




General

Malaysian government sourcesIn-house data publicationsMultilateral agenciesOther sources



Public Sector Open Data: www.data.gov.my
Data catalogue across multiple government agencies in machine-readable format, including accompanying dashboards. See also the archived open data portal, including datasets released by the Penang State Government


Malaysia’s national statistical agency, Department of Statistics Malaysia (DOSM)

Most reports are now available on the main site in PDFs with accompanying Excel files. For other reports (especially older reports), refer to eStatistik (free sign-up). Scans of historical publications may be available at StatsDigital.
OpenDOSM is a scoped version of data.gov.my hosting only DOSM data
MysIDC (to be discontinued in favour of OpenDOSM)

title: Quarterly Penang Statistics
text:
Initiated in 1999, Quarterly Penang Statistics collates data provided by government departments and private organisations at state and national levels, for the use of policymakers, researchers, academics and investors.
This publication contains statistics about Penang’s demographic, social and economic development. Key national economic statistics are also included, covering the areas of agriculture, fisheries, livestock, manufacturing, water, electricity, telecommunications, property, tourism, logistics, health and education.
This publication is now discontinued.

title: About
text:
Penang Institute is proud to present Key Penang Statistics, a portal dedicated to socioeconomic statistics about the state of Penang. What’s more, it comes in interactive format, powered by Tableau.
These dashboards illustrate trends and patterns in an easily comprehensible form, which will hopefully inspire users to communicate with the data in effective and cogent ways.
Users may download graphics as images, PDFs or PowerPoint presentation. The data is also provided for download.






Archive





The following dashboards may not be regularly maintained/updated and are provided for reference only.

Air transport
Maritime cargo
Covid-19 Data Snapshots for Malaysia
Subdivision-level statistics
Life tables
Public housing
